ComicInfo.Summary:
2022 marks seven decades of humor in a jugular vein from MAD Magazine!! Celebrate MAD’s 70thanniversary with this special issue that has 70% NEW material! (Okay…well, almost 68%...probably 48%...maybe 45% in dog years?)New commemorative pieces include: “Another MAD Look at MAD” by Sergio Aragonés, Spy vs. Spy by Peter Kuper, “the Bathroom” a new parody ofThe Batmanby writer Desmond Devlin and artist Tom Richmond, plus “The Usual Gang of Idiots” are returning with a few new hysterically historical gags too. Includes original tributes to MAD from “Weird Al” Yankovic and filmmaker/comedian Jordan Peele, and more! And a jumbo two-page fold-in (that folds intwice) created by writer/artist Johnny Sampson. All wrapped up in a glorious wraparound cover by Mark Fredrickson.
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-01-18 22:46:23. [Issue ID 949590]
